item.title: CVE-2023-48392|2024-01-17T07:23:16.501Z -- kaifa%20technology -- webitr
item.description: Kaifa Technology WebITR is an online attendance system, it has a vulnerability in using hard-coded encryption key. An unauthenticated remote attacker can generate valid token parameter and exploit this vulnerability to access system with arbitrary user account, including administrator’s account, to execute login account’s permissions, and obtain relevant information.
